name: Craftpocalypse - 3D Block Craft Survival
description:
Craftpocalypse - 3D Block Craft Survival i a survival game with some RPG features. It presents crafting features with survival states (thirst, hunger, etc). 

It's currently in an early development stage. You can try it and leave a feedback but be aware: they are different bugs, currently you can't save your progress, and the crafting list has yet to be filled. The are some material the you can gather, but some are still to be developed. 

You can take some mission, as a tutorial to understand the game a little.

New ideas are welcome. Leave a comment or join our facebook group for updates on future version, bug fixes, upcoming features etc.

Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/Craftpocalypse-102525965274728/

Enjoy our game full of bugs!

-Team Exacron
